member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.GetFilesCountAsync(AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters)
member.summary: The GetFilesCountAsync method will get the count of the files that match the search parameters
member.param: An instance of the class defining the search criteria for the files count
member.returns: The count of the matching files or -1 if an error occurred

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.GetDuplicateFilesCountAsync(AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters)
member.summary: The GetDuplicateFilesCountAsync method will get the count of the duplicate files that match the search parameters
member.param: An instance of the class defining the search criteria for the duplicate files count
member.returns: The count of the matching duplicate files or -1 if an error occurred

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.GetFilesAsync(AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters)
member.summary: The GetFilesAsync method will, as its name suggests, get the files that match the search parameters
member.param: An instance of the class defining the search criteria for the files search
member.returns: An enumerable list of instances

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.GetDuplicateFilesAsync(AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters)
member.summary: The GetDuplicateFilesAsync method will, as its name suggests, get the duplicate files that match the search parameters
member.param: An instance of the class defining the search criteria for the duplicate files search
member.returns: An enumerable list of instances

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.GetFileAccessDetail(System.Guid)
member.summary: The GetFileAccessDetail method will, as its name suggests, get the file access details for the specified file
member.param: The ID of the file to retrieve the File Access Details from the database
member.returns: An instance of for the specified File ID

member.summary: The GetFileDetail method will, as its name suggests, get the file details of the specified file
member.param: The ID of the file detail to retrieve from the database
member.returns: An awaitable task containing an instance of containing the, you guessed it, File details...

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.MarkForSoftDeletionAsync(System.Guid)
member.summary: The MarkForSoftDeletionAsync method will, as its name suggests, mark the specified file as soft deleted
member.param: The ID of the file to mark as soft deleted
member.returns: An awaitable task containing a string with the status of the update

member.param: The ID of the file to unmark as hard deleted

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters
member.summary: The class

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.SearchFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets the Search Folder to be used as the root for the search

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.SearchType
member.summary: Gets or sets the Search Type for the search

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.Recursive
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the search is to be recursive or not

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.IncludeSoftDeleted
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the search includes soft-deleted or not

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.IncludeMarkedForDeletion
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the search includes files marked for deletion or not

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.CurrentPage
member.summary: Gets or sets the Current page for the search. This is not validated against the collection it will be applied to

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.ItemsPerPage
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum items per page for the search. This parameter can be set between 5 and 50. The default is 10

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.MaximumSizeOfThumbnail
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum items per page for the search. This parameter can be set between 50 and 850. The default is 850

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.MaximumSizeOfImage
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size of the image to be returned by the search. This parameter can be set between 50 and 999999. The default is 1500

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.SortOrder
member.summary: Gets or sets the Search Order for the search. The default is by Size Descending

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.SearchText
member.summary: Gets or sets the Search Text for the search. If no search text is supplied, the results will not be filtered based on any containing text. Yep, shocking...

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.ExcludedViewSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets the excluded view settings for the search

member.summary: This method builds a string ready to be passed as the query string for calls to the Files API itself
member.returns: A string ready to be passed as the query string

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Files.Api.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.ToString
member.summary: Returns this object in JSON format
member.returns: This object serialized as a JSON object
